sentences.en: He turned and skipped away, singing happily to himself.
sentences.cn: 他转身蹦蹦跳跳地跑了，嘴里高兴地哼着歌。

sentences.en: He used to skip lessons and hang around the harbor with some other boys.
sentences.cn: 他过去经常逃课，在码头上和其他几个男孩瞎混。

sentences.en: I decided to skip the first chapter.
sentences.cn: 我决定跳过第一章。

sentences.en: I wanted to skip the whole thing.
sentences.cn: 我想赖掉这差事.

sentences.en: If you skip breakfast, your blood sugar level will drop and you will probably feel light-headed.
sentences.cn: 如果不吃早餐，血糖含量就会降低，你很可能会觉得晕眩。

sentences.en: It is important not to skip meals.
sentences.cn: 每顿饭都要吃，这一点非常重要。

sentences.en: Lambs like to skip.
sentences.cn: 小羊喜欢跳跃.

sentences.en: Let's skip over this page and come to page 55.
sentences.cn: 咱们越过这一页,看第五十五页.

sentences.en: No, thanks. We'll skip aperitif.
sentences.cn: 不, 谢谢, 饭前酒免了吧!

sentences.en: She likes to skip rope as a warm-up.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢以跳绳来热身。

sentences.en: She skipped lunch in order to go shopping.
sentences.cn: 为了去购物，她没有吃午饭。

sentences.en: Skip , the bartender made the sour planters'punch with exaggerated, ironic care.
sentences.cn: 那位酒吧侍者斯基普拿出夸张的令人啼笑皆非的小心劲儿调制着酸溜溜的花匠式混合甜饮料.

sentences.en: The boxer gave a little skip as he came out of his corner.
sentences.cn: 拳击手稍稍一跃，从他的场角里走了出来。

sentences.en: The boys liked to skip stones on the lake.
sentences.cn: 男孩子喜欢在湖面上用石子打水漂.

sentences.en: The print is too small, you can easily miss [ skip ] a line.
sentences.cn: 字印得太小, 很容易看串行.

sentences.en: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him.
sentences.cn: 他们看到那个男人身后跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩。

sentences.en: They skip rope and play catch, waiting for the bell.
sentences.cn: 他们又是跳绳，又是玩接球，等着上课铃声响起。

sentences.en: We can skip over the details and concentrate on the general issues.
sentences.cn: 你可略过细节部分,而把精力集中在总则上.

sentences.en: Williams skipped the game to be with his wife in the hospital.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯为了在医院里陪他妻子而放弃了这场比赛。

sentences.en: You may skip and read only those passages which concern you.
sentences.cn: 你只需选那些与你有关的段落读一下即可.

sentences.en: You may skip through a book, reading only those passages concerned.
sentences.cn: 你可以跳读一本书, 只拣那些有关的段落读一下即可.

trans.tran_cn: 跳，不参加，略过，快速转移，悄悄溜走，打水漂
trans.tran_en: to not read, mention, or deal with something that would normally come or happen next
to not read, mention, or deal with something that would normally come or happen next
to not read, mention, or deal with something that would normally come or happen next
to not read, mention, or deal with something that would normally come or happen next
